dits.title: Missing semicolon after implicit thing declare
Missing semicolon after String declare
dits.expected:
Line: 1 Col: 12 (tests/fail.dit)
String test
           ^

SyntaxError: Expected ';'

dits.title: Missing semicolon after String declare and assignment
dits.expected:
Line: 1 Col: 20 (tests/fail.dit)
String test = 'cat'
                   ^

SyntaxError: Expected ';'

dits.title: Missing semicolon after list assignment
dits.expected:
Line: 1 Col: 40 (tests/fail.dit)
listOf String test = ['Hello', 'world']
                                       ^

SyntaxError: Expected ';'

dits.title: Missing semicolon after full import
dits.expected:
Line: 1 Col: 34 (tests/fail.dit)
import dit from 'tests/empty.dit'
                                 ^

SyntaxError: Expected ';'

dits.title: Missing semicolon after anon class
dits.expected:

                    ^
